.Rproj.user ## style.css ## toc.css 3.2 To login into another computer using ssh ssh <machine or server> 3.3 Executing commands # List the user that you login whoami # formatting the dates date +%F # Executing one command after the other date +%A; uname -r; whoami ## bruno ## 2021-08-15 ## Sunday ## 5.4.0-80-generic ## bruno Conditional commands execution && This is the basic IF statement The date command must complete successfully than the uname -r command will be running and if execute successfully the whoami command will be executed # If with and date +%F && uname -r && whoami echo echo # If with or ate +%F || uname -r && whoami ## 2021-08-15 ## 5.4.0-80-generic ## bruno ## ## ## bash: line 7: ate: command not found ## 5.4.0-80-generic ## bruno command history !! : execute the last command !12: execute the command 12 on history ctr+r check type of file The file command is used to determining the type fo file : file /etc/issue echo echo file /bin/bash ##
